name: Gasteroids
description:
Gasteroids

Gasteroids is an Asteroids-like game, made in Godot.

Steer your ship, destroy as many asteroids as possible, don't get hit.

Controls:

Rotate left: Left, A
Rotate right: Right, D
Thrust: Up, W
Shoot: Space, Y/Z

Source:

Source available on Github, licensed under the MIT license:
https://github.com/nalquas/gasteroids
